metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Access secures employee and contractors with a faster, safer VPN alternative. Free for up to 50 users. See why IDC named us a Leader.

metaImage.description: Meta image for Cloudflare Access product page.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: What is Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) and what does it do? Read more in our Learning Center.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare named in Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SSE for 2nd year. Announcement >

subMenuItems.linkText: Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE), 2024
Forrester Wave™ for Security Service Edge Solutions, Q1 2024
Forrester Wave™ for Zero Trust Platforms, Q3 2023
Forrester Wave™ for Enterprise Email Security, Q2 2023
IDC MarketScape for Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA), 2023
KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE Integration Suites, 2023
Forrester Opportunity Shapshot: Leverage Zero Trust To Combat Multichannel Phishing Threats

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Access
relatedBlades.subtitle: Fast, reliable Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
relatedBlades.copy: Access verifies context (like identity and device posture) to secure access across your entire environment — no VPN required.

features.title: Strengthen the employee experience
features.description: Improve team productivity with modernized security that makes on-prem apps feel just like SaaS apps. No more slow, clunky VPNs or employee complaints.

features.title: Eliminate lateral movement
features.description: Reduce cyber risk and shrink your attack surface by granting context-based, least privilege access per resource rather than network-level access.

features.title: Scale Zero Trust effortlessly
features.description: Improve tech efficiency by protecting critical apps or highest risk user groups first, then expanding Internet-native ZTNA to protect your entire business.

features.title: Cloudflare named in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE)
features.description: We believe this recognition is a testament to Cloudflare's single-vendor SASE platform and its ability to modernize your network and consolidate more use cases.

imageAssetFile.title: Gartner Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare a Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave™: Security Service Edge Solutions, Q1 2024
features.description: Cloudflare received the highest score in the global network criterion. We believe this recognition validates our commitment to build SASE "the right way," converging network and security services on a composable, programmable connectivity cloud.

imageAssetFile.title: Forrester Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 IDC MarketScape for Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
features.description: IDC cites Cloudflare's "aggressive product strategy to support enterprise security needs." We believe our recognition validates our approach to help businesses of any size get started with Zero Trust and secure access for any user to any resource, without VPNs.

imageAssetFile.title: IDC Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

relatedBlades.title: Top use cases for Access
relatedBlades.copy:
- [VPN replacement](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/vpn-replacement/) - Access is faster and safer than traditional VPNs. Start offloading critical apps for better security and end user experience.
- Accelerate mergers & acquisitions - Avoid a traditional network merge entirely. Integrate with multiple IdPs and provide per-app internal access during M&A.
- [Contractor access](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/third-party-access/) - Authenticate third-party users like contractors with clientless options, social IdPs, and more.
- Developer access - Provide privileged technical users secure access to critical infrastructure without performance tradeoffs.
- [Phishing-resistant MFA](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/phishing-resistant-mfa/) - Roll out strong authentication, like FIDO2-compliant security keys, everywhere.

relatedBlades.title: Access control features across full Zero Trust platform

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Essential security controls to keep employees and apps protected online. Best for teams under 50 users, or proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Protects access to anything on your network and the Internet. Best for teams over 50 users that do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations that want security transformation backed by maximum support, visibility, connectivity and interoperability.

relatedBlades.title: Tackle Zero Trust one step at a time

buttonOne.elementName: Talk to an Expert zero trust enablement button

buttonTwo.elementName: Compare All Plans zero trust enablement btn

features.title: Easy setup and management
features.description: Radically simplify the setup and operation of on-ramping traffic to private resources with [app connector software](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/tunnel/) and tunnel orchestration.

features.title: Seamless, always-on experience
features.description: Achieve peak end user performance and resilience to network outages with Cloudflare's global Anycast technology, ensuring reliability.

features.title: Rapid, early-adopter innovation
features.description: Keep up with the evolution of the Internet itself with a [Zero Trust](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-zero-trust/) provider that constantly out-innovates its peers to make app access faster and more secure.

relatedBlades.title: How it works
relatedBlades.copy:
- Clientless capabilities support HTTPS traffic and in-browser SSH or VNC terminals, while our device client can help evaluate device posture or extend traffic to other in-line services like [Cloudflare Gateway](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/products/gateway/)
- Access verifies identity and device posture and grants continuous, contexual access to all of an organization's internal resources, creating a software-defined perimeter
- In-line WAF and DDoS threat mitigation further strengthen L7 security for apps protected behind Access
relatedBlades.learnMoreText: Learn more in our ZTNA product overview

contentfulAsset.description: Diagram of how Cloudflare Zero Trust Access works

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare Access was a game-changer for Bitso. It made Zero Trust much easier. We now manage access to internal resources more efficiently, ensuring the right people have the right level of access to the right resources, regardless of their location, device or network."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Cloudflare Access became available just in time to prevent us from having to go through the hassle of deploying a VPN. It was an easy choice for us, and Cloudflare Access was shockingly simple to deploy."
"Cloudflare's flexibility and ease of use enabled Platzi to achieve Zero Trust remote access with minimal effort. It's Zero Trust in a box -- it just works!"

"At Delivery Hero, we always strive to deliver an amazing experience to our customers. Cloudflare Access helps us do the same for our internal teams: offering them a secure working environment, and removing the need for a VPN to access all of our applications across the globe."
